action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To permit individuals 70 years of age or older to opt out of jury service in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the District of Columbia Superior Court Jury Duty for Seniors Opt Out Act of 2025.

section.header: Permitting individuals 70 years of age or older to opt out of jury service in Superior Court of the District of Columbia
section.text: Section 11–1908(b), District of Columbia Official Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking or (4) and inserting (4); and
by striking the period at the end of the first sentence and inserting ; or (5) excluded by the Court upon the request of the individual if the individual is 70 years of age or older..
